languages.text: "Вот и я так думаю, Вольный Торговец! Ведите протекторат его курсом — и со временем все вернется на круги своя!"
"My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the protectorate along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"
languages.original_text: "Вот и я так думаю, Вольный Торговец! Ведите протекторат его курсом — и со временем все вернется на круги своя!"

traits.locale_text: "My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the trade empire along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"
"My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the trade empire along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"
"My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the trade empire along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"
"My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the trade empire along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"
"My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the protectorate along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"

languages.text: “我也是这么想的，行商浪人！只要引导这个王朝继续前进就好。这样下去，一切都会慢慢恢复正常！”
languages.original_text: "My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the protectorate along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"

traits.locale_text: “我也是这么想的，行商浪人！只要引导这个王朝继续前进就好。这样下去，一切都会慢慢恢复正常！”

languages.text: «Eso mismo pienso yo, Comerciante Independiente! ¡Guíe el protectorado por su camino y, con el tiempo, las cosas volverán a su cauce!».
languages.original_text: "My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the protectorate along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"

traits.locale_text: «Eso mismo pienso yo, Comerciante Independiente! ¡Guíe el protectorado por su camino y, con el tiempo, las cosas volverán a su cauce!».

languages.text: 「そのとおりです、自由開拓者様！保護領を導いてくだされば、いずれ民の支持も戻りましょう！」
languages.original_text: "My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the protectorate along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりです、自由開拓者様！保護領を導いてくだされば、いずれ民の支持も戻りましょう！」

languages.text: "Ganz meine Meinung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Führt das Protektorat auf seinem Weg – und mit der Zeit kehrt alles wieder zur Normalität zurück!"
languages.original_text: "My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the protectorate along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"

traits.locale_text: "Ganz meine Meinung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Führt das Protektorat auf seinem Weg – und mit der Zeit kehrt alles wieder zur Normalität zurück!"

languages.text: « Vous m'ôtez les mots de la bouche, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Guidez le protectorat vers la prospérité, et avec le temps, tout reviendra à la normale ! »
languages.original_text: "My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the protectorate along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'ôtez les mots de la bouche, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Guidez le protectorat vers la prospérité, et avec le temps, tout reviendra à la normale ! »

languages.text: "Birebir aynı şekilde düşünüyorum Hür Tacir! Protektorayı doğru yolda ilerletirseniz zamanla her şey normale döner!"
languages.original_text: "My thoughts exactly, Rogue Trader! Guide the protectorate along its path — and in time, all things will return to normal!"

traits.locale_text: "Birebir aynı şekilde düşünüyorum Hür Tacir! Protektorayı doğru yolda ilerletin ve zaman içerisinde her şey normale dönecektir!"
